HOLYLIGHT
Usage: holylight
A toggle which allows you to see: Invisible people and objects, even if you don't have 'detect invisibility' Hidden people, even if you don't have 'sense life' Dark rooms, even if you don't have a light
It is expected most immortals will keep HOLYLIGHT on most of the time; it exists so that you have the ability to see what mortals see for debugging purposes.
